name: TlsTestGate
description: Test public or internal endpoints for non-compliant SSL/TLS settings. This extension requires Python 3.7 or 3.8, Python 3.9 is not supported at this time.
author: Joe Gatt

inputs.name: dnsserver
inputs.label: Specify a DNS server to use, either internal or external.
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you use [Split DNS](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Split-horizon_DNS), please specify an authortative name server for the target URL.

inputs.name: failBuild
inputs.label: Fail the build or release if non-compliant SSL/TLS settings are identified?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fail the build or release if non-compliant SSL/TLS settings are identified. The default is to publish the test results whether or not non-compliant settings are identified. Check the box if you want to gate on a failing test.
